00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00043 
00044 
00045 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define DELAY_TIME    0x7FFFFF
00047 
00048 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 static void Delay(vu32 count);
00050 
00051 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00053  * @brief   This function handles NMI exception.
00054  * @retval  None
00055  ************************************************************************************************************/
00056 void NMI_Handler(void)
00057 {
00058   /* Turn on LED1                                                                                           */
00059   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00060   Delay(DELAY_TIME);
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00064  * @brief   This function handles Hard Fault exception.
00065  * @retval  None
00066  ************************************************************************************************************/
00067 void HardFault_Handler(void)
00068 {
00069   #if 1
00070 
00071   static vu32 gIsContinue = 0;
00072   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073   /* For development FW, MCU run into the while loop when the hardfault occurred.                           */
00074   /* 1. Stack Checking                                                                                      */
00075   /*    When a hard fault exception occurs, MCU push following register into the stack (main or process     */
00076   /*    stack). Confirm R13(SP) value in the Register Window and typing it to the Memory Windows, you can   */
00077   /*    check following register, especially the PC value (indicate the last instruction before hard fault).*/
00078   /*    SP + 0x00    0x04    0x08    0x0C    0x10    0x14    0x18    0x1C                                   */
00079   /*           R0      R1      R2      R3     R12      LR      PC    xPSR                                   */
00080   while (gIsContinue == 0)
00081   {
00082   }
00083   /* 2. Step Out to Find the Clue                                                                           */
00084   /*    Change the variable "gIsContinue" to any other value than zero in a Local or Watch Window, then     */
00085   /*    step out the HardFault_Handler to reach the first instruction after the instruction which caused    */
00086   /*    the hard fault.                                                                                     */
00087   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 
00089   #else
00090 
00091   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092   /* For production FW, you shall consider to reboot the system when hardfault occurred.                    */
00093   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094   NVIC_SystemReset();
00095 
00096   #endif
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100  * @brief   This function handles SVCall exception.
00101  * @retval  None
00102  ************************************************************************************************************/
00103 void SVC_Handler(void)
00104 {
00105 }
00106 
00107 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00108  * @brief   This function handles PendSVC exception.
00109  * @retval  None
00110  ************************************************************************************************************/
00111 void PendSV_Handler(void)
00112 {
00113   /* Turn on LED3                                                                                           */
00114   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3);
00115   Delay(DELAY_TIME);
00116 }
00117 
00118 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00119  * @brief   This function handles SysTick Handler.
00120  * @retval  None
00121  ************************************************************************************************************/
00122 void SysTick_Handler(void)
00123 {
00124   /* Turn on LED2                                                                                           */
00125   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00126   Delay(DELAY_TIME);
00127 }
00128 
00129 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131  * @brief   Delay function.
00132  * @retval  None
00133  ************************************************************************************************************/
00134 static void Delay(vu32 count)
00135 {
00136   while (count--);
00137 }
